The vision also aims to develop an education that focuses on advanced technology and engineering, and builds a system of ethical values ​​for future generations
Youth advisory councils will be established in all sectors to take their views and a national strategy will be developed to enhance the country's reputation and soft power
We have plans until the year 2021 .. With the percentage of the UAE we will have a vision for generations spanning five decades and constitute a clear map of the government's long-term work
Future generations will need the means we can put from today, the foundations we raise from now, and the environment for growth must be thought of from this moment

CCEA, chaired by PM @narendramodi has given its approval for development of 403 kms of National Highways in Meghalaya and Mizoram.
The estimated cost of the project is Rs 6,721 crore.
The projects will encourage sub-regional socio-economic development by improvement of infrastructure in Meghalaya and Mizoram.
The projects will also enhance the connectivity with inter-state roads and International Borders.
